channel.title: Tops on Chris Bailey, PhD, CSCS*D, RSCC
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Chris Bailey, PhD, CSCS*D, RSCC

item.description: Chris Bailey, PhD, CSCS*D, RSCC Chris Bailey is a Clinical Assistant Professor in the Kinesiology, Health Promotion, and Recreation Department at the University of North Texas. He is a Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist (CSCS) and a Registered Strength and Conditioning Coach (RSCC) through the National Strength and Conditioning Association (NSCA). At UNT, Chris teaches courses in athlete monitoring, biomechanics, quantitative analysis, quantitative procedures, strength and conditioning, and exercise test and prescription.
